thread.title: NYC SOHO Visit #2
thread.title_full: NYC SOHO Visit #2 - Review of NobleDEN Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SusanLouise
title: NYC SOHO Visit #2
text:
An excellent boutique hotel, 7 stories high at the edge of Chinatown and Little Italy. Floor to ceiling windows with doors in the middle that you can open and look down onto the street.
Very clean, hardwood floors, very comfortable bed and pillows. Note the shower and sink are in the room and only the toilet is in a separate space. Shower is half frosted glass with rainfall shower head. Very cool.
Bath mirror hangs from the ceiling and lights up with a touch of a button.
Parking is only a few blocks away in Chinatown. $52 for 24 hours for an SUV. The garage is a little chaotic. Attendants park it for you.
Walking distance to SOHO and the Freedom tower, Brooklyn Bridge.
Room Tip: Ask for a room in the front so you can overlook the street. See more room tips
